content.raw:
In my testing, inserting a camera caused the sky to disappear in gzclient. Deleting the camera causes seg-fault:
~~~
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
Ogre::Camera::getDerivedPosition (this=0x0)
    at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreCamera.cpp:504
504	/build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreCamera.cpp: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  Ogre::Camera::getDerivedPosition (this=0x0)
    at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreCamera.cpp:504
#1  0x00007ffff19b6bbc in SkyX::SkyX::notifyCameraRender(Ogre::Camera*) ()
   from /home/scpeters/local/lib/libgazebo_skyx.so.1
#2  0x00007ffff104d5d0 in Ogre::RenderTarget::fireViewportPreUpdate (
    this=<optimized out>, vp=<optimized out>)
    at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreRenderTarget.cpp:419
#3  0x00007ffff104d9f0 in Ogre::RenderTarget::_updateViewport (
    this=0x7fffa808d4a0, viewport=0x7fffb7504b88, updateStatistics=true)
    at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreRenderTarget.cpp:145
#4  0x00007ffff104d91b in Ogre::RenderTarget::_updateAutoUpdatedViewports (
    this=0x7fffa808d4a0, updateStatistics=true)
    at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreRenderTarget.cpp:124
#5  0x00007ffff104d3be in Ogre::RenderTarget::updateImpl (this=0x7fffa808d4a0)
    at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreRenderTarget.cpp:101
#6  0x00007ffff104d95c in Ogre::RenderTarget::update (this=0x7fffa808d4a0, 
    swap=false)
    at /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/src/OgreRenderTarget.cpp:541
#7  0x00007ffff730ea08 in gazebo::rendering::Camera::RenderImpl() ()
   from /home/scpeters/local/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
#8  0x00007ffff730ea89 in gazebo::rendering::Camera::Render() ()
   from /home/scpeters/local/lib/libgazebo_rendering.so.1

---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---

   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#13 0x00007ffff561ee9c in QCoreApplication::notifyInternal(QObject*, QEvent*)
    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#14 0x00007ffff5b8dd96 in QWidgetPrivate::drawWidget(QPaintDevice*, QRegion const&, QPoint const&, int, QPainter*, QWidgetBackingStore*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#15 0x00007ffff5d59787 in QWidgetPrivate::repaint_sys(QRegion const&) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

    () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---
